titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988 to repeal certain requirements for the implementation of the metric system of measurements.

bill.summary: 9/27/1988--Introduced. Amends the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988 to repeal certain requirements relating to conversion to the metric system.
